pages.text: Applied Energistics 2 offers digital storage with unparalleled flexibility and efficiency. $(br2)Store your items in ME Drives and access them through crafting terminals.
Expand your storage network with different-sized ME Storage Cells, and use the ME Controller to manage large networks. $(br2)Automate crafting with Molecular Assemblers and Crafting Co-Processors.

In this pack, the Applied Energistics 2 Wireless Terminals mod allows you to access your network remotely. $(br2)Craft Wireless Terminals for items, fluids, and crafting, and enjoy the convenience of your digital network anywhere!
For more details on getting started with AE2, check out the full entry $(l:mod_info/ae2)getting started with AE2$().
